<?xml version="1.0" encoding="euc-kr" ?>
<transaction xmlns="http://www.cyber-i.com/xml/bld" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.cyber-i.com/xml/bld http://www.cyber-i.com/xml/ns/bld-5.0.xsd">
<info> <name></name> <description></description> <author></author> <version></version> <http-access>false</http-access> </info>
<processor-info type="dbms" datasource=""> <sql id="query1"> <query></query> <mapping> <setProperty></setProperty> <getProperty></getProperty> </mapping> </sql>
</processor-info>
<input> <block> <field name="fieldNm" type="string"/> </block> </input>
<output> <block> <field name="outFieldName" type="string"/> </block> </output>
</transaction>
